product_name: Royal Robbins Pastime Shorts - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: When cotton and nylon are combined in a pair of shorts, like Royal Robbins has done with the Pastime Shorts, you get something special: a high-performance travel short that also feels fantastic. Cotton is soft and breathable, while the nylon is durable, quick drying and wrinkle resistant. Hand pockets; back pockets (1 zippered and 1 rip-and-stick), zippered thigh pocket; drop-in cell phone pocket with snap closure. Inseam gusset allows unrestricted range of motion. Royal Robbins Pastime Shorts have a regular fit. Closeout.
short_description: When cotton and nylon are combined in a pair of shorts, like Royal Robbins has done with the Pastime Shorts, you get something special: a high-performance travel short that also feels fantastic.
